name: The Old Wounds
resolution_text1: xxOVERCOME Roll 1 xxSTABILITY and place at this location.
flavortext1: Bata raised his hand in anger. 'When the Five-Fold passed through Boar's Rift, we made space! As they fled from the Empire's borders, we made space! We lifted them up in their time of need.'
flavortext2: 'But now we hear our ways our backwards. Our customs are not valued. Our songs are not sung. If The Amber Hand, who has lived here for many ages, is not respected, then do not be surprised if we aren't interested in fighting your war.'

name: Mole Hunt
resolution_text1: xxTHREAT Instead of placing threat tokens, you may discover the mole by archiving an unlocked Companion asset. If taken from asset deck, shuffle asset deck. Then archive this card.
flavortext1: 'Again! But how did they know which cart to intercept?' Parin asked, exasperated.
flavortext2: 'You know the answer,' said Fuscus. 'Someone on the council must have leaked that information. The bigger question is, who would do such a thing?'
flavortext3: 'I can reach out to Metrodora,' said Fuscus. 'Perhaps we can send out false war plans, and see if someone shows up in the Empire to deliver them?'

name: Grain Shortage
resolution_text1: If there are any Hall locations in play, place an additional xxPROGRESS on this obstacle when it enters play.

name: Grain Shortage
resolution_text1: If there are any Hall locations in play, place an additional xxPROGRESS on this obstacle when it enters play.

name: Discord in Brightdune
resolution_text1: May not trade or muster at this location.
flavortext1: It's easy to say that we are stronger when we work as one people. But in times of shock and disaster, the differences become magnified.
flavortext2: It is always easier to tear down a society than it is to build one up.

name: Pomegranate Heist
resolution_text1: xxOVERCOME The missing crops are tracked down to an abandoned ruin on the outskirts of town. May search asset deck or staging area for Food asset, and place in in-progress area.
flavortext1: 'This is the third incident this month! Wheat, rice, and now pomegranates! How does someone steal a cart full of pomegranates? This can't continue,' Afsaneh said, addressing the stunned farmers.
flavortext2: 'How hard can it be to track down where these crops went? This much food can't just disappear!'

name: Dragon of the Frozen Voice
resolution_text1: Upon entering play, all characters in this region lose 1 xxPSYCHE.
short_flavortext1: Delivers icy breath and feelings of intense apathy.

name: Aldric the Deceitful
short_flavortext1: A rabble-rouser, provocateur, teller of lies, collector of lapis lazuli, and enjoyer of fine wine.

name: Master of Secrets
short_flavortext1: A Master of Secrets is feared across the Empire.

name: Imperial Guard
short_flavortext1: 'The benefits aren't great, but on the plus side they say they won't kill my family.'

name: Imperial Guard
short_flavortext1: 'I can barely feed my family, but at least they let me hit people I don't like.'

name: Imperial Guard
short_flavortext1: 'For the Glory of the Autarch! May she ascend!'

name: Hall of Faces
resolution_text1: xxTHREAT Place xxOBSTACLE Wrath of the Autarch at this location. Then archive this obstacle and place a xxTHREAT token at this location.
short_flavortext1: Nexus of sorcery within the Empire.

name: Horse Bandits
short_flavortext1: 'It's hard work - but what choice do I have?'

name: Restless Dead
short_flavortext1: The undead walk home, looking to find their loved ones from long ago. What secrets do they tell?

name: Restless Dead
short_flavortext1: The undead walk home, looking to find their loved ones from long ago. What secrets do they tell?

name: Dragon of the Critical Word
resolution_text1: Upon entering play, all characters in this region lose 1 xxBODY.
short_flavortext1: What's worse, the acidic taunts or the literal acid breath?

name: Amber Hand Raiders
short_flavortext1: 'One day we'll reclaim our land.'

name: Corruption's Heart
short_flavortext1: Some things are more ancient than the Autarch. More ancient than all human lands.

name: Wrath of the Autarch
short_flavortext1: 'It is time to unify the Empire.'

name: Background Checks
resolution_text1: xxTHREAT Instead of placing a threat token, all characters in the Empire lose 2 xxAP. Background Checks remains in play.
short_flavortext1: 'Wait, who did you say you know here?'

name: Background Checks
resolution_text1: xxTHREAT Instead of placing a threat token, all characters in the Empire lose 2 xxAP. Background Checks remains in play.
short_flavortext1: 'You there! What's your business within the Empire?'

name: Guard Captain
short_flavortext1: 'You have a weird accent for a Southkeep Freetrader?'

name: The Subtect
short_flavortext1: The Subtect is the Autarch's speaker for official Imperial matters.

name: Hogel's Jealousy
short_flavortext1: The Owner of One Thousand Horses is prone to jealousy. Flattery will get you everywhere.

name: Allocating Funds
short_flavortext1: Political concerns necessitate allocating funds toward luxury projects.

name: Zarrah's Paranoia
short_flavortext1: 'Welcome to the cultural center of the Settled Lands!'

name: Nosy Patrons
short_flavortext1: 'I keep seeing you, every Thursday night, like clockwork. And yet - you don't gamble and you don't drink? So what is it exactly you do?'

name: Distrustful Merchants
resolution_text1: May not trade or muster at this location.
flavortext1: Farnaka glares at you. 'We have heard of your surreptitious acts. Now you treat us like criminals! You think we bring Mad Honey and other illicit drugs into your lands? Clean up your own house before you point fingers at ours!'
flavortext2: Naudur nodded along vigorously. 'Yes! Someone close to you is feeding you nothing but lies! Why would we sell drugs when our legitimate businesses are booming?'

name: Rage of the Forlorn Suitors
short_flavortext1: 'You! You have meddled and denied me my right, as Grand Leader of the Golden Hills,' Rastag said furiously. 'Pox Face was to be mine!'

name: War Machines
short_flavortext1: Imperial war machines rain down fire and death.

name: War Machines
short_flavortext1: Imperial war machines rain down fire and death.

name: War Machines
short_flavortext1: Imperial war machines rain down fire and death.

name: The Forgotten Dead
short_flavortext1: Those who have come before, who have sacrificed everything, are no longer remembered.

name: Ur-Akti
short_flavortext1: The swamp is ancient, alive, and vengeful. It is immune to our weapons of steel, and it moves quickly through the tangled growth of the forest.

name: Yellow Blight
resolution_text1: Upon entering play, all characters in xxBRIGHTDUNE must lose 1 xxBODY or 1 xxPSYCHE.
short_flavortext1: Before dying, the oozing yellow pox hamper breathing and cause madness.

name: Mad Honey Addiction
short_flavortext1: 'What of this conflict matters to me? One ruler is the same as the next, we look forward to grander vistas than your limited worldview allows.'

name: The Weaver
resolution_text1: May not muster at this location.
short_flavortext1: On the Weaver's loom is written the warp and weft of each life.

name: Alone Against the Empire
flavortext1: The Subtect's lies reached the ears of Brightdune's allies.
flavortext2: Zarrah received plans that Brightdune would move against Lily Manor, seizing their valuables. Eliza heard persistent rumors that Brightdune was using sorceries for diabolical ends, seeking an apotheosis of power.
flavortext3: And an agent whispered a dark secret into Pox Face's ear, that she would be taken hostage in the night.

name: Animaelic Echoes
short_flavortext1: Somewhere lies the Animaelic Forest, the source of shadow and light. Its echoes can be harnessed for great power.
